subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Roofs
lead_paragraph: With rain hampering the final stages of the U.S. Open, talk of putting a retractable roof on a court at the National Tennis Center intensified.
snippet: With rain hampering the final stages of the U.S. Open, talk of putting a retractable roof on a court at the National Tennis Center intensified.
